uvi.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v5.10.44
uvi.description:
ASoC: core: Fix Null-point-dereference in fmt_single_name()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.44 by commit 0e2c9aeb00289f279b8181fbd4c20765127d8943, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 45dd9943fce08f1b38352ff9453682253bdf19b7. For more details please see the references link.
